newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - BMC Software lowered.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - BMC Software lowered.

text.p: -- Salomon Bros analyst John Jones said in a research note that he lowered his recommendation on BMC Software Inc to buy from strong buy "because of the stock's performance, appreciating by 42 percent since our upgrade on July 24 at $59-1/2."
-- Shares were off 3/4 to 84-1/4 in midsession Nasdaq trade.
-- At the same time Jones raised his fiscal 1997 earnings forecast to $3.17 per share from $2.96 and the fiscal 1998 view to $4.00 per share from $3.71.

-- "Our new price target is $90 to $95 but we cannot support a strong buy rating and would not be opposed to taking profits now, even with 10 percent more upside to our new price target," the analyst said.
